name: Sally's Quick Clips
storyline: While reflecting on her years of success, Sally's mind drifts back to her humble beginnings when, fresh out of beauty school, she jumped at the chance to appear on the hit TV show Styling America. Arrange scissors, dryers, hair color and more to gather resources for the special services you'll provide to your choosy clients. Match your customers' tastes and make them look sharp in fun mini-games. With your help, Sally's sure to win the big prize on this dazzling TV competition.
summary: Match your customers' tastes to win the big prize on a dazzling TV competition.
